rows.label: tlk42100152_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I have had it with this country.
It's simply far too hot!

rows.label: tlk42100152_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Can the Divine Beast even tolerate this kind
of heat? What if it passes out and ends
up sinking into the Cloud Sea?

rows.label: tlk42100152_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Humans are the ones that keep
messing with the Divine Beast. They should
take responsibility!

rows.label: tlk42100152_03_msg0004
rows.name:
If it does end up sinking, I'm sneaking
aboard a ship to Liberalitas.

rows.label: tlk42100152_03_msg0005
rows.name:
I heard the Demon King is gone
now, so it would be great to visit
the Phonex colony!
